metadata.title: CVE-2018-1067 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Compliant (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: In Undertow before versions 7.1.2.CR1, 7.1.2.GA it was found that the fixfor CVE-2016-4993 was incomplete and Undertow web server is vulnerable tothe injection of arbitrary HTTP headers, and also response splitting, dueto insufficient sanitization and validation of user input before the inputis used as part of an HTTP header value.

criterions.comment: undertow: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
